from pyspark.sql.types import IntegerType, ArrayType, StructType, StructField
from pyspark.sql import Row
from pyspark.sql.functions import *

# service bus source
service_bus_table = "odw_harmonised_db.sb_service_user"

# horizon sources
hzn_service_user_table = "odw_standardised_db.horizon_case_involvement"
hzn_nsip_project_table = "odw_standardised_db.horizon_nsip_data"
hzn_nsip_representation_table = "odw_standardised_db.horizon_nsip_relevant_representation"

# target table
spark_table_final = "odw_harmonised_db.service_user"

# Get data out of the service bus with additional fields needed for Horizon data
service_bus_data = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT DISTINCT
        ServiceUserID
        ,id
        ,salutation
        ,firstname
        ,lastname
        ,addressline1
        ,addressline2
        ,addressTown
        ,addressCounty
        ,postcode
        ,addressCountry
        ,organisation
        ,organisationType
        ,role
        ,telephoneNumber
        ,otherPhoneNumber
        ,faxNumber
        ,emailAddress
        ,webAddress
        ,serviceUserType
        ,serviceUserType AS serviceUserTypeInternal
        ,caseReference
        ,sourceSystem
        ,sourceSuid
        
        ,Migrated
        ,ODTSourceSystem
        ,SourceSystemID
        ,IngestionDate 
        ,NULLIF(ValidTo, '') AS ValidTo
        ,'' as RowID
        ,IsActive
    FROM 
        {service_bus_table}

appeal_casework_appellant_data = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        CAST(NULL AS Long) as ServiceUserID
        ,CAST(ContactId AS String) as id
        ,Cast(Title AS String) as salutation
        ,Cast(FirstName AS String) as firstName
        ,Cast(LastName AS String) as lastName
        ,Cast(Address1 AS String) as addressLine1
        ,Cast(Address2 AS String) as addressLine2
        ,Cast(City AS String) as addressTown
        ,Cast(County AS String) as addressCounty
        ,Cast(PostCode AS String) as postcode
        ,Cast(Country AS String) as addressCountry
        ,Cast(OrganisationName AS String) as organisation
        ,Cast(OrganisationTypeName AS String) as organisationType
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as role
        ,Cast(TelephoneOffice AS String) as telephoneNumber
        ,Cast(TelephoneMobile AS String) as otherPhoneNumber
        ,Cast(Fax AS String) as faxNumber
        ,Cast(Email AS String) as emailAddress
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as webAddress
        ,Cast('Appellant' AS String) as serviceUserType
        ,Cast('Appellant' AS String) as serviceUserTypeInternal
        ,Cast(case_number AS String) as caseReference
        ,Cast('Horizon' AS String) as sourceSystem
        ,Cast(ContactID AS String) as sourceSuid

        ,"0" as Migrated
        ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
        , to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
        ,CAST(null as string) as ValidTo 
        ,'' as RowID
        ,'Y' as IsActive
    FROM
        {hzn_service_user_table}
    WHERE
        expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM {hzn_service_user_table})
        AND ContactId IS NOT NULL
        AND typeOfInvolvement IN ('Appellant', 'tAppellant', 'Apellant')

appeal_casework_agent_data = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        CAST(NULL AS Long) as ServiceUserID
        ,CAST(ContactId AS String) as id
        ,Cast(Title AS String) as salutation
        ,Cast(FirstName AS String) as firstName
        ,Cast(LastName AS String) as lastName
        ,Cast(Address1 AS String) as addressLine1
        ,Cast(Address2 AS String) as addressLine2
        ,Cast(City AS String) as addressTown
        ,Cast(County AS String) as addressCounty
        ,Cast(PostCode AS String) as postcode
        ,Cast(Country AS String) as addressCountry
        ,Cast(OrganisationName AS String) as organisation
        ,Cast(OrganisationTypeName AS String) as organisationType
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as role
        ,Cast(TelephoneOffice AS String) as telephoneNumber
        ,Cast(TelephoneMobile AS String) as otherPhoneNumber
        ,Cast(Fax AS String) as faxNumber
        ,Cast(Email AS String) as emailAddress
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as webAddress
        ,Cast('Agent' AS String) as serviceUserType
        ,Cast('Agent' AS String) as serviceUserTypeInternal
        ,Cast(case_number AS String) as caseReference
        ,Cast('Horizon' AS String) as sourceSystem
        ,Cast(ContactID AS String) as sourceSuid

        ,"0" as Migrated
        ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
        , to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
        ,CAST(null as string) as ValidTo 
        ,'' as RowID
        ,'Y' as IsActive
    FROM
        {hzn_service_user_table}
    WHERE
        expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM {hzn_service_user_table})
        AND ContactId IS NOT NULL
        AND typeOfInvolvement = 'Agent'

nsip_project_applicant_data = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        CAST(NULL AS Long) as ServiceUserID
        ,CAST(caseNodeId AS String) as id
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as salutation
        ,Cast(ApplicantFirstName AS String) as firstName
        ,Cast(ApplicantLastName AS String) as lastName
        ,Cast(AddressLine1 AS String) as addressLine1
        ,Cast(AddressLine2 AS String) as addressLine2
        ,Cast(AddressTown AS String) as addressTown
        ,Cast(AddressCounty AS String) as addressCounty
        ,Cast(PostCode AS String) as postcode
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as addressCountry
        ,Cast(PromoterName AS String) as organisation
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as organisationType
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as role
        ,Cast(ApplicantPhoneNumber AS String) as telephoneNumber
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as otherPhoneNumber
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as faxNumber
        ,Cast(ApplicantEmailAddress AS String) as emailAddress
        ,Cast(ApplicantWebAddress AS String) as webAddress
        ,Cast('Applicant' AS String) as serviceUserType
        ,Cast('Applicant' AS String) as serviceUserTypeInternal
        ,Cast(CaseReference AS String) as caseReference
        ,Cast('Horizon' AS String) as sourceSystem
        ,Cast(caseNodeId AS String) as sourceSuid
        
        ,"0" as Migrated
        ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
        , to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
        ,CAST(null as string) as ValidTo 
        ,'' as RowID
        ,'Y' as IsActive
    FROM
        {hzn_nsip_project_table}
    WHERE
        expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM {hzn_nsip_project_table})
        AND caseNodeId IS NOT NULL

relevant_reps_represented_data = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        CAST(NULL AS Long) as ServiceUserID
        ,CAST(ContactId AS String) as id
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as salutation
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as firstName
        ,Cast(FullName AS String) as lastName
        ,Cast(CONCAT(BuildingNumber, ' ', Street) AS String) as addressLine1
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as addressLine2
        ,Cast(Town AS String) as addressTown
        ,Cast(County AS String) as addressCounty
        ,Cast(PostCode AS String) as postcode
        ,Cast(Country AS String) as addressCountry
        ,Cast(OrganisationName AS String) as organisation
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as organisationType
        ,Cast(JobTitle AS String) as role
        ,Cast(PhoneNumber AS String) as telephoneNumber
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as otherPhoneNumber
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as faxNumber
        ,Cast(EmailAddress AS String) as emailAddress
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as webAddress
        ,Cast('RepresentationContact' AS String) as serviceUserType
        ,Cast('RepresentationContactRepresented' AS String) as serviceUserType
        ,Cast(CaseReference AS String) as caseReference
        ,Cast('Horizon' AS String) as sourceSystem
        ,Cast(ContactID AS String) as sourceSuid

        ,"0" as Migrated
        ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
        , to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
        ,CAST(null as string) as ValidTo 
        ,'' as RowID
        ,'Y' as IsActive
    FROM
        {hzn_nsip_representation_table}
    WHERE
        expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM {hzn_nsip_representation_table})
        AND ContactID IS NOT NULL

relevant_reps_agent_data = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        CAST(NULL AS Long) as ServiceUserID
        ,CAST(AgentContactId AS String) as id
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as salutation
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as firstName
        ,Cast(Agent_FullName AS String) as lastName
        ,Cast(CONCAT(Agent_BuildingNumber, ' ', Agent_Street) AS String) as addressLine1
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as addressLine2
        ,Cast(Agent_Town AS String) as addressTown
        ,Cast(Agent_County AS String) as addressCounty
        ,Cast(Agent_Postcode AS String) as postcode
        ,Cast(Agent_Country AS String) as addressCountry
        ,Cast(Agent_OrganisationName AS String) as organisation
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as organisationType
        ,Cast(Agent_JobTitle AS String) as role
        ,Cast(Agent_PhoneNumber AS String) as telephoneNumber
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as otherPhoneNumber
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as faxNumber
        ,Cast(Agent_EmailAddress AS String) as emailAddress
        ,Cast(NULL AS String) as webAddress
        ,Cast('RepresentationContact' AS String) as serviceUserType
        ,Cast('RepresentationContactAgent' AS String) as serviceUserType
        ,Cast(CaseReference AS String) as caseReference
        ,Cast('Horizon' AS String) as sourceSystem
        ,Cast(ContactID AS String) as Agent_ContactID

        ,"0" as Migrated
        ,"Horizon" as ODTSourceSystem
        ,NULL AS SourceSystemID
        , to_timestamp(expected_from)  AS IngestionDate
        ,CAST(null as string) as ValidTo 
        ,'' as RowID
        ,'Y' as IsActive
    FROM
        {hzn_nsip_representation_table}
    WHERE
        expected_from = (SELECT MAX(expected_from) FROM {hzn_nsip_representation_table})
        AND AgentContactId IS NOT NULL
Union all dataframes and write to the table
Now need to sort internal ids, IsActive flags, and valid_to dates

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW vw_service_user_calculations_base
AS
SELECT  
    row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY id ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC) AS ReverseOrderProcessed
    ,row_number() OVER(ORDER BY IngestionDate asc, id asc) AS ServiceUserID
    ,id
    ,IngestionDate
    ,ValidTo
    ,'0' AS Migrated
    ,CASE row_number() OVER(PARTITION BY id ORDER BY IngestionDate DESC)
        WHEN 1 THEN
            'Y'
        ELSE
            'N'
    END AS IsActive                
FROM
    odw_harmonised_db.service_user

df_calcs = spark.sql("""
                        SELECT
                            CurrentRow.ServiceUserID
                            ,CurrentRow.id 
                            ,CurrentRow.IngestionDate
                            ,COALESCE(NULLIF(CurrentRow.ValidTo,''), NextRow.IngestionDate) AS ValidTo
                            ,CASE
                                WHEN raw.id IS NOT NULL THEN 
                                    "1"
                                ELSE 
                                    "0"
                            END AS Migrated
                            ,CurrentRow.IsActive
                        FROM
                            vw_service_user_calculations_base AS CurrentRow
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_service_user_calculations_base AS NextRow
                                ON CurrentRow.id = NextRow.id
                                AND CurrentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed - 1 = NextRow.ReverseOrderProcessed
                            LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT id FROM  odw_harmonised_db.sb_service_user) AS Raw
                                ON CurrentRow.id = Raw.id 
                            ORDER BY currentRow.ReverseOrderProcessed

results = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT DISTINCT ServiceUserID
        ,id
        ,salutation
        ,firstname
        ,lastname
        ,addressline1
        ,addressline2
        ,addressTown
        ,addressCounty
        ,postcode
        ,addressCountry
        ,organisation
        ,organisationType
        ,role
        ,telephoneNumber
        ,otherPhoneNumber
        ,faxNumber
        ,emailAddress
        ,webAddress
        ,serviceUserType
        ,serviceUserTypeInternal
        ,caseReference
        ,sourceSystem
        ,sourceSuid
        
        ,Migrated
        ,ODTSourceSystem
        ,IngestionDate
        ,ValidTo
        ,RowID
        ,IsActive
    FROM 
        {spark_table_final}""")
select count(*) from odw_harmonised_db.service_user where isactive='Y'
